title: Moroccan Oil Intense Hydrating Mask 8.5 Ounce
description: Introducing the power of Moroccanoil. The Moroccanoil treatments have the ability to restore condition to over-processed hair, caused by colour procedures, perms and enviromental factors. This Intense Hydrating Mask is a rich, creamy treatment, designed to hydrate and help repair damaged hair. Moroccanoil's Intense Hydrating Mask is a high performace mask that does not need heat to be activated; only 5 to 7 minutes will treat hair with needed moisture whilst helping to add shine and elasticity.With continued use, this highly effective mask helps revitalise hair, restoring shine and manageability.

title: 100 Percent Pure Luminous Primer 1 oz.
description: 100% Pure Luminous Primer is full of vitamins and antioxidants to nourish and protect your skin, while creating a radiant complexion. Red wine resveratrol, a powerful antioxidant, helps slow down the effects of aging as vitamins further protect and smooth your skin. The light-reflecting pigments perfect your complexion, for a healthy, glowing appearance.

title: Benefit Cosmetics Lemon Aid
description: What it is:A color-correcting eyelid primer.What it does:Benefit Lemon Aid is a miracle-working soft-yellow correcting cream that instantly hides redness and discoloration on your eyelids.What else you need to know:In a snap, eyes look refreshed, frisky, and ready for fun.
